title: (We Are All) Brightwing
description: Facing the teenage years under the best of circumstances is not easy: Trying to face the trials of adolescence when faced with chronic illness or traumatic physical injury can seem almost insurmountable. Bethany Brennan, a 15-year-old severe asthmatic and Jamie Richardson, a 16 year-old boy struggling to adjust to life as an amputee, meet in a hospital. They are drawn together by shared troubles and a mysterious Being who then calls them into another world: There, the physical and emotional traumas they have experienced become the power that can preserve that world. But to do so, they might have to destroy a life to save another.
author: M.J.C. Fields
